name: Smash Karts
description:
Smash Karts is a multiplayer arena battle game. Drive your kart, pick up weapons, and blow up other karts to win!

Choose between a selection of wacky little characters and face-off with other players in one of three arenas. 

Each game is 3 minutes long and packed full of fast-paced action.

There are various weapons to pick up, from invincibility to missiles, machine-guns and mines. 

Customize your experience with tons of different characters, kart-colours, wheels, hats, celebrations and much more!

Start playing now, it's a blast.
